name: RANDOM ACCESS
description:
12 pages A5 format. 

Something stirs in the android underground, memories are sold and bought, assembled and extracted. An android wants to buy freedom.

Random Access is the perfect introduction for SPRAWLS, adding another layer of mistery and exploration to the city grid.

"Cities are necrophagic. They are built atop, of and from the corpses of prior iterations. The bones are gnawed but not broken — something always remains. The city is haunted by itself, iterations stretching out and backwards towards some unthinkable first foundation."

Luke Gearing
